attr.title: Strange Adventures in Infinite Space
attr.desc:
Digital Eel's Strange Adventures in Infinite Space is an incredibly addictive space exploration game that plays like a cross between a board game and Star Control.

The game is best described as the condensed version of Star Control: imagine the same sense of humour you have come to know and love in Accolade's classic, minus the grand plot, mix with more intergalactic business savvy, and you'll have a good idea of what SAIS is all about.
